title: 16th Karmapa leaves Tibet
notes: Leaves Tibet after 1959 upheaval; exile seat develops in Sikkim.

title: Rumtek rebuilt/inaugurated
notes: Rumtek becomes primary Karma Kagyu seat in exile.

title: First major Western tour of 16th Karmapa
notes: Tours widely credited with establishing Western Kagyu centers.

title: Foundation stone laid for KIBI
notes: Karmapa International Buddhist Institute established for higher studies.

title: Regency begins under senior disciples
actors: Shamarpa; Tai Situ; Gyaltsab; Jamgon Kongtrul
notes: Regency period frames later recognition dispute.

title: Enthronement at Tsurphu
notes: Enthroned as 17th Karmapa at traditional seat.

title: Sikkim High Court decision re: Rumtek dispute
notes: Key legal milestone in Rumtek institutional control axis.

title: India Supreme Court affirms earlier order
notes: Supreme Court decision referenced by Kagyu Office.

title: Joint statement after meeting in France
actors: Ogyen Trinley Dorje + Trinley Thaye Dorje
notes: "Signals reconciliation / shared intent to preserve lineage."

title: Joint statement on Shamarpa reincarnation cooperation
actors: Ogyen Trinley Dorje + Trinley Thaye Dorje
notes: Commitment to collaborate on recognition/training process.
